properties.name: use_sendbox
properties.description: Choose whether to use test ot live environment

properties.name: payments_api
properties.description: The base URL for the payment api

properties.name: public_key
properties.description: Checkout API publicKey. Please paste your public key here.

properties.name: secret_key
properties.description: Checkout API secretKey. Please paste your secret key here.

properties.name: send_billing_address
properties.description: Send billing address to checkout to enable AVS check. Default is true.

properties.name: pending_on_redirect
properties.description: Enables feature to return status pending on redirect in case transaction is not in final state.

properties.name: attempt_n3d
properties.description: Enables auto downgrade payment to no-3Ds in case bank does not support 3Ds.

properties.name: exemption
properties.description: Specifies an exemption reason so that the payment is not processed using 3D Secure authentication.
